title: riot gutting all my mains and a sudden huge increase of afk and trollshas ruined lol fun for me
body:
ever since ive started out in s5, i mained one champ in mid and one in jg. talon and shaco, call me corrupted or cancer or whatever. these champions used to be difficult but rewarding. and before any of u say they were faceroll, talons lane was crap and if he atually killed you lvl 4 or 5 and u were using any midlaner that isnt karthus or like nidalle, first off ur boosted and second of all its a damn honor. shaco was a good early bad mid good late, and his ad was simply gutted by q and backstab changes, if u dont want to make crit stack or be powerful on a non adc dont give ti to a dmg needing assassin??? whats he supposed to build ad lethality items dont offer penetrate on anything but his aas.  his ult is a very unreliable abilit thats ez as hell to avoid, niether his pop or aa dmg is garunteed. His e has laughabe dmg, as well as a requirement to max q, wich all ends up in weak dmg, red side is simply an awful chore. his early ganks are now unreliable. Dont even get me started on talon, he can now kill soeon in all stages of the game. great.syke IF U LAND EVERY SINGLE ABILITY WITHA DEKAY AND STUPID SHORT RANGE, AS WELL A SMOST OF THEM DELAYINF UR NEXT AA THAT IS NEEDED EXCEPT THE STUPIDLY SHORT LITTLE JAX JUMP THAT CAN BE INTERUPTED HAHA ISNT THAT FUN FOR COUNTERPLAY AND SO CAN UR E, WOW U CAN GET DENIED KILLS AND LIFE WITH SMPLE POINT AND CLICK STUNS RUINING UR ANIMATIONS INST THAT ALL FUN. and seriously why does his e have a long ast time and cancel edge of night and ult thats retarded, even tho hes not in combat? edge of night says taking dmg will interup the channel????????????????? so how is young talon supposed to kill a ayne or ezreal past a braum vi and malphite, with a little retard locket soraka that can click on u and suddenly ur whole plan is ruined cuz u cant press abilitys like u could in ur head when u made ur paln.. 

alright maybe im a little tilted since i keep gwtting smurfs who dont fear bans that afk to smoke or play cs go, or entire couple bot lane duos thtat leave to play something else just cuz not main........ i hate silver to gold mmr

is that the face on shaco boxes

I started in S3. Nothing is sacred.

You either adapt or  you quit.

> [{quoted}](name=Sir Fuzzi,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=60fmXr9w,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-15T01:48:08.903+0000)
>
> You either adapt or  you quit.

This is the best statement of the year.

but i cant just just give up on my favorite champion. theyre what kept me playing. this is gonna sound os cancer by my main form of enjoyment and fun in this game is oneshotting adcs especially with assassins u can call me cancerous now

> [{quoted}](name=omegaarab,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=60fmXr9w,comment-id=000100000001,timestamp=2016-12-15T02:52:09.769+0000)
>
> but i cant just just give up on my favorite champion. theyre what kept me playing. this is gonna sound os cancer by my main form of enjoyment and fun in this game is oneshotting adcs especially with assassins u can call me cancerous now

you dont have to stop playing your favorite champions, just adapt to how they work now, learn the new limits. thats all.

i am pretty much adapted and know how much dmg each move does etc and how to make use of hi(idk about shaco aybe i just get bronzies everytime i play him) my point is the champions are definitely worse. ill never forget the old 3 min first bllood start red and q into enemy blue invade start, or how talon used to be able to counterplay mages and oneshot adcs....good times wish there was a way to play it one last time.. :(
